name: Math Minute Madness
description:
Are you a Math Master?

Train your skills in this fast paced game! Take on Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, and Division, or all of them at once! That's madness!

Select up to 5 connecting Tiles to get to your target number. The more Tiles, the higher your score. But be quick, you only have 60 seconds!

Has over 30 Achievements to keep you coming back for more.

As this is my first uploaded project, it's FREE for your enjoyment.  If you would like to see future projects, feel free to donate!
